select b.BOARD_ID, b.BOARD_TITLE, u1.USER_NAME as CREATED_NAME, u2.USER_NAME as MODIFIED_NAME, b.MODIFIED_AT, b.CREATED_AT FROM BOARD AS b JOIN "USER" AS u1 ON b.CREATED_BY = u1.USER_ID JOIN "USER" AS u2 ON b.MODIFIED_BY = u2.USER_ID
CREATED_AT asc BOARD_ID desc asc desc
select BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_AT, MODIFIED_BY from BOARD

select b.BOARD_ID AS BOARD_ID, b.BOARD_TITLE AS BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT AS BOARD_CONTENT, u1.USER_NAME AS CREATED_NAME, u2.USER_NAME AS MODIFIED_NAME, b.MODIFIED_AT AS MODIFIED_AT, b.CREATED_AT AS CREATED_AT, fa.FILE_ID AS FILE_ID, fa.FILE_NAME AS FILE_NAME, fa.FILE_ORIGIN_NAME AS FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, fa.FILE_PATH AS FILE_PATH FROM BOARD AS b JOIN "USER" AS u1 ON b.CREATED_BY = u1.USER_ID JOIN "USER" AS u2 ON b.MODIFIED_BY = u2.USER_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT f.FILE_ID, f.FILE_NAME, f.FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, f.FILE_PATH, bf.BOARD_ID FROM FILE as f LEFT JOIN BOARD_FILE as bf ON f.FILE_ID = bf.FILE_ID) AS fa ON b.BOARD_ID = fa.BOARD_ID WHERE b.BOARD_ID = #{id}
select exists(select * from BOARD where BOARD_ID = #{boardId})
mapper.insert: insert into BOARD (BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, VISIBILITY, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_AT) VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{visibility}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{modifiedBy}, #{modifiedAt})
mapper.update: update BOARD set VISIBILITY = 0 WHERE BOARD_ID = #{id}
